name: Palindrome
statement: A palindrome is a string that reads the same in both directions, for example z , uwu , or moom .
inputFormat: The first line contains an integer $$$t$$$ ($$$1 \leq t \leq 100$$$) â€” the number of testcases. The following $$$t$$$ lines each contain a string of length at most $$$100$$$ consisting of lowercase English letters.
outputFormat: For each test case, output " YES " or " NO ", denoting the answer.

sampleTests.input:
8
ac
tle
radar
racecar
php
atcoder
codeforces
steam
sampleTests.output:
NO
NO
YES
YES
NO
NO
YES
YES
